text: Lars is a male name. The pronunciation of the name is [lahrz; Swedish, Norwegian lahrs]. It is derived from the Old Norse name Laurentius, which means "crowned with laurel." It is generally used in Scandinavian countries and Germany. In the United States, Lars is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the country in 2021). == People == * Lars LÃ¸kke Rasmussen, Prime Minister of Denmark * Lars Ulrich, Danish musician Category:Given names * Lars Onsager, American physical chemist and theoretical physicist (1903-1976) * Lars Vilks, Swedish artist * Lars Ahlfors, Finnish mathematician (1907-1996) * Lars Ulrich, Danish drummer == References ==
title: Lars
